name: Google Drive Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Google Drive events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Drive Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Google Drive events occur

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Credential Type | 默认值: oAuth2

triggerOn.name: triggerOn
triggerOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | (必填项)
available_options: Changes to a Specific File (值: specificFile)
Changes Involving a Specific Folder (值: specificFolder)

fileToWatch.name: fileToWatch
fileToWatch.natural_language_description: 参数名: File | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Watch For | 作用: When to trigger this node | 默认值: fileCreated | (必填项)
available_options: File Created (值: fileCreated) - When a file is created in the watched drive
File Updated (值: fileUpdated) - When a file is updated in the watched drive
Folder Created (值: folderCreated) - When a folder is created in the watched drive
Folder Updated (值: folderUpdated) - When a folder is updated in the watched drive

folderToWatch.name: folderToWatch
folderToWatch.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

asas.displayName: Changes within subfolders won't trigger this node
asas.name: asas
asas.natural_language_description: 参数名: Changes within subfolders won't trigger this node

driveToWatch.name: driveToWatch
driveToWatch.description: The drive to monitor. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
driveToWatch.natural_language_description: 参数名: Drive To Watch | 作用: The drive to monitor. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: root | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fileType (值: None) - Triggers only when the file is this type
